title: BOC user views existing Loan tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Loan tx exists in the system
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user searches for a Loan tx in advanced search
AND opens tx through players history
custom_expected:
THEN BOC user can view existing tx 
AND fields match data discovery 
AND when form is in View mode, a "Close" button is present 

http://vpqzii.axshare.com/#p=loan&c=1

title: Club user views existing Loan tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Loan tx exists in the system for the current club logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN Club user searches for Loan tx using adv search
AND opens tx through player's history
custom_expected:
THEN Club user sees existing tx 
AND form matches data discovery
AND when form is in View mode, a "Close" button will be present 

http://vpqzii.axshare.com/#p=loan&c=1

title: Create new Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to a Player History Widget
AND Player has no existing loan tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks 'create new'
AND Transaction>Minor>Assignment>Loan
custom_expected: THEN New Loan tx loads in edit mode

title: Delete Loan tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to an existing loan tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks delete
AND clicks 'Yes'
custom_expected:
THEN show warning
AND tx deletes
AND blue notification appears
AND user is taken back to point of entry
IF user clicks 'no' THEN no action taken and user is returned to tx form

title: Club user receives notification when Loan tx is approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user has submitted a loan tx to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the BOC user clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN Club user receives notification in clipboard
AND hyperlinks work in widget

title: Club user receives notification when Loan tx is rejected
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user has submitted a loan tx to the BOC
custom_expected:
THEN Club user receives a notification on their clipboard
AND hyperlinks work in widget

title: Club user receives notification when Loan tx is reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user has submitted a loan tx
AND BOC Approves tx
custom_expected:
THEN club user receives notification on their clipboard
AND hyperlinks work in widget

title: BOC user reverses Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has an 'approved' loan tx
AND it is the most recent approved tx for player
custom_expected:
THEN field requirements and formatting rules are run
AND successful notification displays
AND Status is updated to 'reversed'
AND tx is displayed as 'voided' in player history
AND 'suppress' button is displayed on tx

title: BOC user reverses and suppresses Loan tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has an approved tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'reverse and suppress'
custom_expected:
THEN tx is first reversed then suppressed
AND system rules will run
AND user will see a successful suppress notification
AND tx will not appear on player history
IF it is NOT the most recent approved tx then show error message

title: BOC user suppresses Loan tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a reversed tx
custom_expected:
THEN tx is hidden
AND user gets successful blue notification

title: Submit a Loan tx to a Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to a preliminary or rejected loan tx
AND 'mexican league' is NOT selected
AND submit is available in edit/view mode
AND submit button is blue for club/grey for BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'submit to club'
custom_expected:
THEN rule checks run
AND status changes to 'submitted to club'
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND successful notification displays
AND action item appears in user clipboard
AND tx hyperlinks work in widget

title: Submit a Loan tx to the BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a preliminary or rejected loan tx
AND 'mexican league' is selected
AND submit is available in edit/view mode
AND submit button is blue for club/grey for BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'submit to BOC'
custom_expected:
THEN system runs a rule check
AND status updates to 'submitted to BOC'
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND successful notification appears
AND system sets player's pending org/club to that of the tx
AND Flags/comments/files appear in approval widget properly
AND hyperlinks work in widget
AND tx appears in green font in player history

title: Club rejects Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a submitted to club loan tx
AND reject button is available in grey in both edit/view modes
custom_expected:
THEN rules are checked
AND status updates to 'rejected'
AND successful reject notification displays
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND reverse pending org/club
AND remove from player history

title: Club can edit existing Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a preliminary or rejected loan tx
AND has permissions ("To Club" CANNOT edit)
AND is in view mode
custom_expected:
THEN 'save' button appears in 'edit' buttons place
AND user can edit all portions of the form
AND user will see a 'cancel' button in grey

title: BOC can edit exisintg Loan tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has an approved or reversed loan tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can only add an attachment
AND edit existing attachments
AND updated comments/BOC notes

title: User can Save Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is in a Loan tx
AND is in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN form will be saved
AND updated to preliminary
AND successful save notification appears
AND form will load in view mode

title: Cancel Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has an existing or new Loan tx
AND is in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN no changes are saved
IF new tx then return to point of entry
IF existing tx then reload in view mode
AND clicking no to confirm dismisses message

title: BOC approves Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a preliminary, submitted to club, submitted to BOC or a Rejected Loan tx
AND approve button is in blue
custom_expected:
THEN form reloads in view mode if not already in view mode
AND successful approve notification appears
AND Item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND system sets player org/club by the "Loan to" field
AND new entry found in player history

title: BOC rejects Loan tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a submitted loan tx
AND reject button is available in grey in both edit/view modes
custom_expected:
THEN rules are checked
AND status updates to 'rejected'
AND successful reject notification displays
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND reverse pending org/club
AND remove from player history

title: Club user should be prevented from creating tx for player from another club
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user tries to create a Loan tx for a player from another club
custom_expected: THEN show blocker

title: User prevented from creating tx for player without a current or valid minor contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is creating a loan tx for a player WITHOUT a MNC in any of the following states: Terms Submitted, Terms Accepted, Update Terms Accepted, Pre-approved, Approved
custom_expected: THEN show blocker

title: User prevented from creating tx for player who already is on Loan
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a player already on loan
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to create another loan tx
custom_expected: THEN show blocker

title: User receives warning if assignment date is not within 3 business days of current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a tx with the assignment date being 3 business days before or after current date (excluding holidays)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve or submit
custom_expected:
THEN show warning
IF Club user has not entered comments show hard error
AND back/ignore and continue buttons work

title: User receives warning if tx date falls outside the Assign to Club's season
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a tx outside the Assign To club's season
custom_expected:
THEN show error message
IF BOC then ignore and continue/back buttons work

title: User receives error if no Assignment Agreement is attached
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a tx WITHOUT an attached assignment agreement
AND Loan to Org field is mexican league
custom_expected:
THEN show error
AND ignore/back buttons work

title: User receives error if attempting to submit a Loan for an inactive player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is creating a tx for an inactive player
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: User receives warning if tx precedes certain txs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is creating a new transaction
AND has another tx submitted, pending or approved for the same player
custom_expected:
THEN show error
IF BOC show ignore and continue option
AND ignore/back buttons work

title: User receives error attempting to submit a loan tx for a MJ league player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a player with a pending or active roster status at the MJ level
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: User receives warning if the under control limit will be violated with tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a clubs under control limit is at max
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a transfer tx to that club
custom_expected:
THEN show error
AND Ignore/back buttons work

title: User prompted to create an Add C if the player requires one for transferred level of play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a player WITHOUT an Add C
AND 'mexican league' is selected
AND the tx date is between March 15th and Rules 5 draft system date
custom_expected:
THEN show error
IF BOC user show ignore option
AND ignore/back buttons work

title: User prompted to create Add C if player requires one for transferred level of play (part 2)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a player WITHOUT an Add C
AND 'mexican league' is selected
AND tx takes place EITHER before March 15th OR after Rule 5 draft system date
custom_expected:
THEN show warning
AND ignore/continue/back buttons work

title: User receives error attempting to approve a tx with a tx date after the current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a tx with assignment date AFTER current date
custom_expected:
THEN show error
AND clicking back closes modal and returns user to tx

title: BOC admin permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged into BOC Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN user views/prints MN tx in all states
AND views flags for all tx and all tx attachments in all states
AND create/delete/edit/e-sign/submit all MN tx for MN players
AND approve/reject/reverse/suppress all MN tx and associated flags
custom_expected: THEN user has permissions

title: Club admin permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as Club Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN user views/prints MN tx in all states EXCEPT suppressed
AND views flags for tx and tx attachments IF "From" or "To" ORG in all states EXCEPT suppressed
AND create/delete/edit/e-sign/submit/attach MN tx for ONLY "From" or "To" ORG's MN players UNLESS BOC only tx
AND approve/reject/reverse/suppress MN tx and associated flags for ONLY "From" or "To" ORG's players
custom_expected:
THEN user has permissions
AND cannot see BOC notes field 
OR comments field UNLESS "to" or "from" ORG

title: BOC basic permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Basic
custom_steps:
WHEN user views/prints MN tx in all states
AND views all flags for all tx and tx attachments in all states
custom_expected:
THEN user has permissions
AND cannot make changes or e-sign

title: Club basic permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as club basic
AND club matches the "from" club
custom_steps:
WHEN user views/prints all MN tx in all states EXCEPT suppressed
AND can view comments
AND can view attachments
AND can view all approved MN tx
custom_expected:
THEN user has correct permissions
AND CANNOT see BOC notes
AND CANNOT edit/change tx

title: Those who do not have permission should not be able to see any Loan txs
View existing Return tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on a player's history widget
AND that player has an existing return tx
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the return tx
custom_expected:
THEN it opens in view mode in same window
AND there will be a working grey 'close' button
AND it will be red in preliminary, green in pending and black in all other states
AND fields match DD

title: Create new Return tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to a player's history widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks create new>transaction>MJ>assignment>return
custom_expected:
THEN system checks for existing return tx
IF return tx already exists, system will open that in view mode UNLESS preliminary, then in edit mode
AND new tx follows wireframe and DD

title: Delete Return tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to a preliminary/rejected return tx
AND has permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks delete on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN show message
AND message buttons should work as per story

title: BOC user reverses Return tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing an approved return tx
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND successful reverse notification will display
AND tx status updated to reversed
AND tx displays as voided in player history
IF tx is not most recent approved the error and back button works

title: BOC user reverses and suppresses tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a preliminary/rejected return tx
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks reverse and suppress
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule check
AND tx first reverses then suppresses
AND status changes to reversed
AND tx is hidden
IF not most recent approved tx then show error and back button works

title: BOC user suppresses tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a reversed return tx
custom_expected: THEN tx is hidden

title: Club user receives notification when tx is Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club has submitted a return tx to the BOC
custom_expected:
THEN club user receives notification on clipboard
AND hyperlinks work

title: Club user receives notification when tx is Rejected
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club has submitted a return tx to the BOC
custom_expected:
THEN user receives notification
AND hyperlinks work

title: Club user receives notification when tx is Reversed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club has submitted a return tx to the BOC
custom_expected:
THEN user gets a notification
AND hyperlinks works

title: Submit Return tx to a Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a preliminary or rejected tx
AND 'mexican league' is NOT selected
AND is in edit OR view mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks submit to club (blue for clubs, grey for BOC)
custom_expected:
THEN system run rule checks
AND status is updated to submitted to club
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND item appears in action item widget
AND hyperlinks work

title: Submit Return tx to BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has preliminary or rejected tx
AND 'mexican league' is NOT selected
AND is edit OR view mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit to BOC (blue for clubs, grey for BOC)
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND status is updated to submitted to BOC
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND player's pending org/club is updated
AND Player history is updated
AND approval item populates in approvals widget
AND files/comments/flags show in widget
AND hyperlinks work

title: Edit existing Return tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing a return tx
AND has permissions
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks 'edit'
AND user clicks 'save'
AND user clicks 'cancel'
custom_expected:
THEN form reloads in edit mode
AND save button appears where edit button was
AND preliminary/rejected states will be able to edit all fields
AND successful save notification appears
AND loads tx in view mode
AND status changes to preliminary IF saved for first time
AND Edit only gives the From club access to attach new files in any state other than Preliminary or Rejected. Club cannot edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction.
AND To Club cannot edit any existing attachments or any other part of the transaction in any state. 
AND BOC is able to edit all fields in all states except for Approved and Reversed transactions. 
AND BOC can attach new files or edit existing attachments or update comments/notes in approved/reversed states
AND 'cancel' button throws confirmation message
IF not saved first cancel will return user to point of entry
IF saved first then cancel will not save any changes and load tx in view mode
IF 'no' on 'cancel' no action taken

title: BOC user approves Return tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a transaction (in view or edit mode) in Preliminary, Submitted to Club, Submitted to BOC and Rejected states
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND status is updated to approved
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND successful notification displays
AND item is removed from approvals widget
AND player's org/club is updated
AND player's history is updated

title: BOC user rejects Return tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a transaction in edit/view mode in submitted to BOC state
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND successful notification appears
AND status updated to rejected
AND item is removed from approval widget
AND player's org/club is reversed
AND entry in player history is removed

title: Club user rejects Return tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has submitted to club tx
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND Status updates to rejected
AND successful notification displays
AND approval item is removed
AND player's org/club are reversed
AND player history entry removed

title: Club user prevented from creating a tx for a player belonging to a diff org
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to another ORG's player
custom_expected: THEN show blocker

title: Prevented from initiating tx for a player NOT on loan
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to player not already on loan
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Prevented from initiating tx for a player who does NOT have a valid minor contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a player that does NOT have MNC in these states: Terms Submitted, Terms Accepted, Update Terms Accepted, Pre-approved, Approved
custom_expected: THEN show blocker

title: Receive warning if assignment date is not within 3 business days of current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has tx not within 3 business days of current date
custom_expected: THEN show hard error

title: Receive warning if tx date precedes certain txs
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a tx that precedes another Approved, Pending to club or Submitted transaction of any type except waiver transactions, re-affiliation or tender
custom_expected: THEN show warning

title: Receive error attempting to return a MJ League player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user creates tx for MJ player
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Receive warning if under control limit will be violated with tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a tx for a club with a max under control limit
custom_expected: THEN show warning

title: User prompted to create Add C if player requires one for level of play for tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has created a new tx for a player WITHOUT an Add C in any of these states: Tendered, Approved, Pending Approval, or Update
AND tx is between march 15th and rule 5 draft system date for the current year
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: User prompted to create Add C (part 2)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has created a tx for a player without an Add C in any of these states: Tendered, Approved, Pending Approval, or Update
AND tx is date before march 15th OR after rule 5 draft system date for the following year
custom_expected: THEN show warning

title: BOC receives error attempting to approve tx with tx date after the current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has selected a tx date after current date
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: BOC admin permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC admin
custom_expected: THEN permissions follow AC

title: Club admin permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as Club admin
custom_expected: THEN permissions follow AC

title: BOC basic permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC basic
custom_expected: THEN permissions follow AC

title: Club basic permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as club basic
custom_expected: THEN permissions follow AC

title: Those who do not have permission should not be able to see any Return txs
View existing NES tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to a player's history
AND player has a NES tx
custom_expected:
THEN tx opens in view mode in the same window
AND follows wireframe/DD

title: BOC create new NES tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user navigates to a player's history widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks create new "place player on NES list" tx
IF preliminary/rejected tx exists from past 10 days
OR submitted tx exists
custom_expected:
THEN new tx opens
OR existing tx opens in edit mode
OR existing tx opens in view mode
AND tx follows wireframe/DD

title: Club sees NES list tx greyed out in create new dropdown
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a player's history
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks place player on NES list
custom_expected:
THEN it will be greyed out
AND clicking it will NOT trigger any action

title: Delete NES tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to a preliminary tx
AND has permissions
custom_expected:
THEN show confirmation message
AND yes/no buttons work as per story

title: BOC approves NES list tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND status updated to approved
AND tx reloads in view mode
AND successful blue notification appears
AND updates player history
AND updates player's MJ/MN roster status

title: BOC edits existing place on NES list tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a preliminary tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks edit
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN all fields should be editable (EXCEPT in approved and reversed tx)
AND only comments/notes/files are editable
AND tx reloads in view mode

title: Receive warning if tx date precedes certain txs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating a new tx
AND player has earlier tx in any of these states: Approved, Pending to club or Submitted transaction of any type except waiver transactions, re-affiliation or tender
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Receive error attempting to place player on NES list that is a MJ league player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating tx for a MJ player or player w/pending roster status of MJ
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Receive warning if suspension start date is after reinstatement date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user sets the suspension date after reinstatement date
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Receive error attempting to submit tx if player is currently affiliated with a Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has player affiliated or pending affiliation with a club
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Receive error attempting to submit tx if player is already on NES list
custom_preconds: GIVEN user selects player with pending/current MJ/MN status of NES
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Receive error if player has an Approved MN contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user selects player with current approved MNC
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Receive error if the player has a Terms Accepted MN contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user selects player w/Terms accepted/Update/Pre-Approved MNC status
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: Receive error if the player has an Approved MJ contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user selects player w/Approved, Terms Confirmed, Pending Approval, Pending Approval (Terms Conifrmed), Update MJC status
custom_expected: THEN show error

title: BOC approver receives error attempting to approve tx with tx date after current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user selects an assignment date after current date
custom_expected: THEN show warning
